name: ApexFusion
0:
”Alexa, ask Apex Fusion for a status report.”
”Alexa, tell Apex Fusion to start feed cycle A.”
”Alexa, ask Apex Fusion to log a phosphate test.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: apex fusion
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Neptune Apex aquarium controller owners can now talk to their aquarium to issue feed commands, turn on and off outlets, and get customized status reports about important information like water temperature, pH, water current, and light intensity directly from Alexa.

Linking your Apex Fusion account to this skill will allow you to control any system that you have control access to.
